long_description: This freestanding portable 20 X 10 shelter protects from sun and rain. It's ideal for backyard activities, camping, watersports and beach and golf outings. Features a strong truss-style straight leg frame; leg height can be adjusted. Aircraft-grade aluminum frame is sturdy yet easy to pitch; sets up in about 60 seconds. Waterproof, seam-sealed, fire-retardant canopy fabric. Includes heavy-duty carry bag, poles and stakes.
short_description: This freestanding portable 20 X 10 shelter protects from sun and rain. It's ideal for backyard activities, camping, watersports and beach and golf outings.
